## Using virustotal

### Installation

To get the current development version from GitHub:


```{r, eval=F}
#library("devtools")
install_github("soodoku/virustotal")
```

#### Load up the lib:

```{r, eval=F}
library(virustotal)
```

#### Authentication

Start by getting the API key from [https://www.virustotal.com/](https://www.virustotal.com/). Next, set it:

```{r api_key}
set_key("a02e20acc06810579d7ae83e6a3690aaa18bc0c072b31a1d9723da812ea1e017")
```

#### Get domain report

Get report on a domain, including passive DNS:

```{r domain}
domain_report("http://www.google.com")
```

#### Get URL report

Get report on a domain, including URL:

```{r, url}
url_report("http://www.google.com")
```

#### Get IP report

```{r, ip}
ip_report("8.8.8.8")
```
